Description: IxLoad on AWS 2-TestAppliance Add-On Test CloudFormation

TestAppliance1Eth1PrivateIpAddresses.default: TestAppliance1 Eth1 Private IP Address CSV List

TestAppliance2Eth1PrivateIpAddresses.default: TestAppliance2 Eth1 Private IP Address CSV List

UserEmailTag.Description: Email address tag of user creating the stack

UserLoginTag.Description: Login ID tag of user creating the stack

IxClientInstanceType.Description: Instance type of Keysight Client VM

IxClientSSHKey.Description: Name of an existing EC2 KeyPair to enable SSH access

TestApplianceInstanceType.Description: Instance type of TESTAPPLIANCE Appliance VM

TestAppliance1Eth0PrivateIpAddress.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP Address of the form x.x.x.x
TestAppliance1Eth0PrivateIpAddress.Description: TestAppliance1 Eth0 Management Subnet IP Address

TestAppliance1Eth1PrivateIpAddresses.Description: TestAppliance1 Eth1 Test1 Subnet IP Address CSV list

TestAppliance2Eth0PrivateIpAddress.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x

TestAppliance2Eth1PrivateIpAddresses.Description: TestAppliance2 Eth1 Test2 Subnet IP Address CSV list

InboundIPv4CidrBlock.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
InboundIPv4CidrBlock.Description: IP Address /32 or IP CIDR range connecting inbound to Keysight Client
